name: Julie Fedorchak

issues.title: Energy Infrastructure Regulation
issues.description: Strong supporter of energy infrastructure development, particularly in oil and gas sectors
issues.source: North Dakota Public Service Commission records

issues.title: Utility Rate Regulation
issues.description: Advocates for balanced utility rate structures that protect consumer interests while supporting infrastructure investment

issues.title: Rural Broadband Expansion
issues.description: Supports expanded internet infrastructure in rural North Dakota communities

issues.title: Agricultural Infrastructure Support
issues.description: Advocates for policies supporting agricultural infrastructure and energy development in rural areas

issues.title: Environmental Regulation Balance
issues.description: Supports measured environmental regulations that do not overly burden energy and agricultural industries
issues.source: Public Service Commission environmental policy statements
